title: MIPS Binary Game
description: Educational assembly game that teaches binary arithmetic through low-level puzzles, registers, and memory-mapped IO challenges.

title: Next.js Portfolio Platform
description: Current site: statically generated portfolio with dynamic project zones, Tailwind theming, and automated GitHub Pages deployment.

title: AI Chat Bot
description: A conversational AI assistant using the OpenRouter API, featuring real-time responses and a clean JavaScript frontend.

title: File Encryption Tool
description: Command-line C++ utility for encrypting and decrypting files.

title: Stardust Saga Refactor
description: Re-architecting a 2D action adventure in Godot 4 with a modular ECS, object pooling, and scene streaming for buttery-smooth combat.

title: Dev Productivity Dashboard
description: Full-stack dashboard for personal KPIs, code snippet search, and automation hooks powered by JWT auth and MongoDB text indexes.

title: Personal Finance Engine
description: Spring Boot microservice that ingests transactions, enforces budgeting rules, and exposes a typed REST API with PostgreSQL backing.
